Class GUIView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.view.View
        • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.view.GUI.GUIView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableInterface, java.util.Observer

    public class GUIView
extends View
implements TableInterface
    Class that represents all the Graphical User Interface component of our implementation
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari

        color - the familiar moved
        position - the position in the yield zone
        Throws:
        ElementNotFoundException - if the player does not exist
